name: Bill Gates
story: I was 13 when I first got access to a computer. I wrote a program to play tick-tack-toe.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
story: Learning how to program didn't start off with wanting to learn all of computer science or trying to master this discipline or anything like that, It started off because I wanted to do this one simple thing -- I wanted to make something that was fun for myself and my sisters.

name: Gabe Newell
story: The programmers of tomorrow are the wizards of the future, You're going to look like you have magic powers compared to everybody else.
